alert.note: Alert for Dent; Phelps; Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 2:01AM CST until February 16 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Shannon County in south central Missouri... Dent County in south central Missouri... Northeastern Texas County in south central Missouri... Southeastern Phelps County in east central Missouri... * Until 245 AM CST. * At 201 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Doolittle to 9 miles southwest of Salem to 9 miles west of Summersville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rolla, Current River State Park, Echo Bluff State Park, Montauk State Park, Ozark National Scenic Riverways, Salem, Bunker, Lenox, Montauk, Turtle, Jadwin, Howes Mill, Darien, Lake Spring, Gladden, Anutt, Bangert, Boss, Howes and Hartshorn. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 181 and 183. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
